title: Hampta Pass Trek
desc: A breathtaking crossover trek that takes you from the lush green valleys of Kullu to the barren landscapes of Lahaul, offering dramatic changes in scenery.
highlights: Spectacular views of the Dhauladhar range
Diverse landscapes from forests to high-altitude deserts
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive at Manali and acclimatize
Day 2: Drive to Jobra and trek to Chika (3,100m)
Day 3: Trek from Chika to Balu Ka Ghera (3,600m)
Day 4: Cross Hampta Pass (4,270m) and descend to Shea Goru
Day 5: Trek to Chatru and drive to Chandratal Lake and Manali

title: Valley of Flowers Trek
desc: A UNESCO World Heritage site that comes alive with hundreds of alpine flowers during the monsoon season, set against the backdrop of majestic Himalayan peaks.
highlights: Vibrant meadows with rare Himalayan flowers
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive at Joshimath from Haridwar
Day 2: Drive to Govindghat and trek to Ghangaria (3,050m)
Day 3: Explore Valley of Flowers National Park
Day 4: Trek to Hemkund Sahib (4,380m) and back to Ghangaria
Day 5: Trek back to Govindghat and drive to Joshimath
Day 6: Return to Haridwar

title: Goecha La Trek
desc: A challenging but rewarding trek that offers the closest possible views of the magnificent Kanchenjunga, the third highest mountain in the world.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive at Yuksom from Gangtok
Day 2: Trek from Yuksom to Sachen
Day 3: Trek from Sachen to Tshoka
Day 4: Trek from Tshoka to Dzongri
Day 5: Acclimatization day at Dzongri with excursion to Dzongri Top
Day 6: Trek from Dzongri to Thansing
Day 7: Trek from Thansing to Lamuney
Day 8: Early morning trek to Goecha La viewpoint and back to Kokchurang
Day 9: Trek from Kokchurang to Tshoka
Day 10: Trek from Tshoka to Yuksom
Day 11: Return to Gangtok

title: Kashmir Great Lakes Trek
desc: A visual feast that takes you through pristine alpine lakes, meadows, and glaciers in the heart of Kashmir, often called "Paradise on Earth".
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive at Sonamarg from Srinagar
Day 2: Trek from Sonamarg to Nichnai via Shekdur
Day 3: Trek from Nichnai to Vishansar Lake via Nichnai Pass
Day 4: Trek from Vishansar to Gadsar via Gadsar Pass
Day 5: Trek from Gadsar to Satsar
Day 6: Trek from Satsar to Gangbal Twin Lakes
Day 7: Trek from Gangbal to Naranag
Day 8: Return to Srinagar

title: Markha Valley Trek
desc: A classic trek through the remote and stark landscapes of Ladakh, featuring Buddhist monasteries, traditional villages, and high mountain passes.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrive at Leh and acclimatize
Day 2: Second day of acclimatization in Leh with short excursions
Day 3: Drive to Chilling and trek to Skyu
Day 4: Trek from Skyu to Markha
Day 5: Trek from Markha to Hankar
Day 6: Trek from Hankar to Nimaling
Day 7: Trek from Nimaling to Shang Sumdo via Kongmaru La
Day 8: Drive from Shang Sumdo to Leh
Day 9: Departure from Leh

title: Kudremukh Trek
desc: Located in the Western Ghats, this trek takes you through lush green forests, grasslands, and streams in the Kudremukh National Park.
highlights: Scenic views of the horse-faced peak
itinerary: Day 1: Drive from Bangalore/Mangalore to Mullodi village, begin trek to Kudremukh peak
Day 2: Return trek to Mullodi and drive back

title: Rajmachi Fort Trek
desc: A popular trek in the Sahyadri range that leads to twin fortresses of Shrivardhan and Manaranjan, offering panoramic views of the surrounding valleys.
itinerary: Day 1: Drive from Mumbai/Pune to Lonavala, trek to Rajmachi village
Day 2: Explore Shrivardhan and Manaranjan forts, trek back to Lonavala

title: Kolli Hills Trek
desc: Known as the "Mountain of Death" due to its 70 continuous hairpin bends, this trek offers beautiful waterfalls, temples, and viewpoints in the Eastern Ghats.
itinerary: Day 1: Drive from Chennai/Trichy to Kolli Hills base, trek to halfway point
Day 2: Trek to Agaya Gangai waterfall, explore surrounding areas
Day 3: Visit Arapaleeswarar Temple, trek down and return

title: Chembra Peak Trek
desc: The highest peak in Wayanad, offering breathtaking views of the heart-shaped lake and surrounding tea plantations and green valleys.
itinerary: Early morning start from Kalpetta
Trek through tea plantations to the heart-shaped lake
Continue to Chembra Peak summit
Descend back to the base by evening
